issue.title: [C++] Add uppercase support to ARROW_USER_SIMD_LEVEL.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9871](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9871). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/util/cpu_info.cc#L423>, currently it's lowercase. Other convention like ARROW_SIMD_LEVEL use uppercase, correct it for better alignment.
